114.content:
Star had always idealized the life of laziness and gluttony, and being a baby would make that so much easier! So, instead of going to school, Star decided she was going to live out the rest of her life as the big, fat baby she'd always wanted to be. With a wave of her wand, she magically found herself shrinking down, down, down until she was no older than a few days old. Star still retained her teenage brain, as well as her knowledge on how to operate her wand, so this change was purely aesthetic.
"Yay! I'm a baby! Now it's time to get me lots of food to make me into a FAT baby!" Star said in a high-pitched voice, as she began to create tons of huge food portions in her room. As they spawned in, Star was able to eat each and every last bit of it, swallowing down burger quadruple her own size, guzzle down fries, slurp steaks and even chug down big quarts of milkshakes.
Every second she ate, Star was getting fatter, and it seemed she wasn't going to slow down any time soon...

11413.content:
In a state of shock, Star panicked and used her wand to teleport herself somewhere different. The last thing she heard from Marco was "Star, wai--!" before she found herself in a totally new location. Luckily, she was still able to move, even as a massive baby blob, and surveyed her surroundings. It seemed very dark and dusty, as though nobody had been here in centuries, an area lost in time. It was a bit spooky, and she was about to teleport herself back to face the consequences of her actions when she suddenly heard heavy machinery, as well as something that smelled absolutely divine. She couldn't tell what it was, but whatever it was she knew it was edible.
"So hungry..." Star smiled, drooling from her mouth, feeling her stomach growl. She followed her nose, guided through the pitch-black area until she ran into a door with a more well-lit area, realizing she was just in the broom closet of a massive dessert factory!
"Oh, man... So many treats! I want it all!" Star smiled, rushing up to begin gorging.

12.content:
Star Butterfly was just your normal magical princess who now lived on Earth getting into all kinds of trouble.
One day while she was having a bad day at school being bored and having crummy weather Star Butterfly wondered to herself
"Oh man...why didn't I just stay in bed today? I'm still tired and being here is soooo boring. I wish I could just go back to the house and chill out. too bad I can't rewind time" she said resting her chin in her hand looking forward in class

That's when she suddenly jumped out of her seat "Wait that's it! I'll just rewind time! she said excitedly.
The teacher said "Quiet please! and Star sat back down feeling a bit embarrassed speaking outloud
But now she knew just what to do.

During break period. Star sneaked into the bathrooms and began to use her magic wand "Rewind time...go back to the past and let me redo what has been done" she said to her wand as it glowed purple her eyes glew too and she knew it was working.
But...something was wrong as she looked at her wrist watch the clock was not going backwards but she did notice her hands growing smaller and softer.

"What? Oh no! she said as her body began to grow smaller her skin becoming softer. her hair growing shorter. her limbs becoming smaller and more chubby. her face growing round and cute with big eyes.
She was getting younger! her wand messed up and she was accidentally making herself younger and younger
And before she could even stop it. soon poor Star was left......

But there would be time for karmic irony later, for now Star was faced with bigger problems. "Oh no, I'm so young! I look like I was just born!" Star stated, now realizing she was completely nude! She couldn't let anyone see her like this, they'd never let her forget it! She would be kicked out of school, she'd be the laughingstock of all of Mewnie!

For this reason, Star needed a way out. She looked around for her Magic Wand, and found it dropped on the floor next to her now over-sized clothes. She was about to get down, but found herself in another predicament. Now that she was so tiny, she couldn't exactly climb OFF the counter. The ground was so far down, she'd easily break one or more of her fragile bones.

An entire month had passed, though it's not as if Star would've noticed. Her life had become all about eating and sleeping, gulping down endless amounts of food from her captor Jackie while she splayed herself across her massive body. At first people went searching for Star, but for some mysterious reason, likely something to do with Jackie, they all stopped. It was as if they either didn't care about her, or just forgot her existence entirely.

Star would continue to hold out hope, however, not knowing that the search parties had been called off and she may as well just be another random baby. It wasn't as if she could leave, either, her body had grown so massive she could easily crush cars beneath her ass, her belly gorged to the point of filling up nearly the entire basement she dwell in.
As Jackie came down with many more bags of food to feed the massive infant Star, the little infant sighed in a depressed tone. "N-nobody's coming for me, are they? I'm gonna be trapped down here forever..."
"Yes, little Star. Well... Not forever." Jackie mentioned. "Eventually we'll have to move you, you're getting so big you'll soon outgrow the house. But I need to let you in on a little secret..."

12412122222121313.content:
Despite having her memory wiped from everyone and everything, Jackie didn't even want Star's body to be seen ever again. In preparation for this day, she found an underground bunker that was equipped with it's own time-space displacement array, which allowed for the space to go on for eternity, and time to move much, much slower. You could spend a millions upon billions of centuries trapped in this space, and only a fraction of a nanosecond would pass in the real world.
"Here we are, Piggy. Where you'll spend the rest of eternity. I won't be here to see you grow into the massive blob I know you will, for I have a boyfriend to meet." Jackie smiled. "You'll outgrow the world, the solar system, entire galaxies, constantly growing forever without end. Even when the world comes to an end, you won't be aware of it. You'll be trapped in this pocket dimension, blissfully unaware of everything going on outside. If you think about it, I'm doing you a favor."

Jackie hooked up a tube to Piggy's mouth, and huge bulges of food came pouring in, fattening her up rather quickly. Piggy just moaned in pleasure as Jackie left her, snickering ominously.
"Goodbye, Star... You were always such an annoying brat, it's only fitting you spend the rest of eternity trapped in a fat body, your old life forgotten with nobody around to save you." Jackie mentioned, as she left Piggy alone in this realm forever...

124121222221213131.content:
Piggy was sad she would never see her mommy again but everything else she said was a dream.
All she wanted was to eat and grow fatter and her mommy would make sure that dream would become real and last forever
Now in this giant white room she could grow and grow decades would pass and not even a second outside would of gone by.
Piggy would never notice or care. As Jakie stuffed the feeding tube into her mouth. Piggy just moaned in pure pleasure as an endless stream of sugar coated cake batter pure down her throat. "Mmmmmmmmmhhhhhhh "Gulp gulp gulp gulp gulp"

Jackie would spend the rest of her life with Marco marrying him and starting a family with him. with Marco not knowing anything about her freind Star. Jackie never never even mentioned her like she never existed. she herself even soon forgot about her.
Piggy meanwhile would spend decades upon decades just growing. her cloths long ago ripping apart as she became two as big as the planet.
Her fat rolls jiggled all over. her soft newborn fat jiggling and wobbling around as she ate and moaned.
Piggy lost all sense of time. soon her mind began to melt away.

She didn't have any real thoughts anymore. she forgot about her mommy Jackie, she soon forgot her own goals and even her bare bones personality began to fade.
Soon Piggy became nothing more but a robot. her eyes glazed over as her mind went blank like a busted TV. with only her heart beating and the sounds of her emotionless eating filled the never ending room.
Star had reached her final chapter. an endless chapter that would never end just her growing for all eternity....
124121222221213131.title: Piggy would spend forever here, eventually beco...

1241212222212131311.content:
Nobody would ever see or hear from her ever again. She wasn't even Piggy anymore, just an permanent blob of flesh growing and growing, reaching sizes far past the extent of the universe in this infinite plane. She had even spent so much time in this realm, that even if she managed to shrink back down, regain her memories and leave, the whole planet had already been destroyed, and all that was left of anywhere was this realm, where the mindless, soulless baby blob would continue to grow forever. No matter what happened, Star would keep filling her reality-crushing body, resuming to make it infinitely massive, no part aside from her naturally wobbling belly moving even an inch.

Star was gone. Everything she knew was gone. All that was left was her big, fat belly.
